message.body: Hi Sara if you are around and not too busy could you stop by and see how ### is doing? We spoke briefly today and I'm really worried about her. She doesn't want to see me but I feel she could really use a friend. Sorry to write you out of the blue like this. ####
Hey no prob, we have plans tomorrow and over the wknd. I'll catch up w her tonight though. Thanks for reaching out. Hope you're well
Thank you so much. I'm afraid she's going to drop out of school or flunk out. I know that will be devastating for her and #####################################can't do anything about it.
